title: Garlic and Onion Harvest -  Cold Climate Gardening

tasks.task: Gardening tasks including onion and garlic harvesting, curing, and storage
subtasks: Storing pulled onions in a garden wagon
Pulling garlic cloves with minimal root damage
Harvesting garlic scapes to promote bulb growth
Chopping back garlic tops for drying
Arranging onions and garlic for curing in a well-ventilated, low-sunlight area
Identifying a cold storage area for onions and garlic in the basement
Preparing containers (like the garden wagon) for storage of harvested produce
